notes.left: Provide exact information as per the dataset if coding to ICD-10 or MONDO ontologies is not possible
notes.right: Provide exact information as per the dataset

meta.notes: For medication, provide date of first prescription dispensation (MM-YYYY). For one-time treatments, such as surgeries, provide the date of the intervention.
For medication, provide date of last prescription dispensation (DD-MM-YYYY). Leave blank for one-time treatments such as sugeries.

medication_start_date.description: Date of the first prescription dispensation (MM-YYYY)
medication_start_date.name: medication_start_date

meta.notes: For self-reported information provide date when started taking the Rx.

medication_end_date.description: Date of the last prescription dispensation (MM-YYYY)
medication_end_date.name: medication_end_date

meta.notes: For self-reported information provide date when stopped taking the Rx.

phenotype_source_text.name: phenotype_source_text
phenotype_source_text.description: Phenotype (or abnormality) as reported in the study's dataset

meta.notes: Provide exact information as per the dataset

phenotype_HPO_category.name: phenotype_HPO_category
phenotype_HPO_category.description: Term used for the phenotypic abnormality category in the Human Phenotype Ontology terminology

meta.notes: Refer to the categories of the Phenotypic Abnormality Subontology of the HPO (HP:000018) https://hpo.jax.org/app/browse/term/HP:0000118

notes.left: Refer to HL7 CodeSystem to identify relationship between donors http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
Refer to HL7 CodeSystem to identify relationship between donors http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
Refer to HL7 CodeSystem to identify relationship between donor and family member http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleCode
